---
title: "Central Park Weather Dashboard"
output:  
  flexdashboard::flex_dashboard:
    orientation: columns
    vertical_layout: fill
---

```{r, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(viridis)
library(p8105.datasets)
library(plotly)
library(flexdashboard)
data("ny_noaa")


ny_noaa = 
  ny_noaa %>%
  sample_n(5000) %>%
  separate(date, into = c("year", "month", "day"), convert = TRUE) %>% 
  mutate(
    tmax = as.numeric(tmax),
    tmin = as.numeric(tmin),
    snow_mm = snow,
    snow = round(snow_mm * 0.03937 * 4) / 4)
```

 
Column {data-width=650}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Snow and 

```{r}
  ny_noaa %>% 
  mutate(text_label = str_c("Snow (mm)")) %>% 
  plot_ly(
    x = ~month, y = ~tmin, type = "box", 
    text = ~text_label, alpha = 0.4)
```

Column {data-width=350}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Minimum temperature, Central Park

```{r}
 ny_noaa %>% 
  plot_ly(x = ~month, y = ~tmin, color = ~snow, type = "scatter", mode = "lines", fill = "tozeroy")
```

### Minimum temperature distribution, by site

```{r}
  ny_noaa %>% 
  plot_ly(x = ~month, y = ~tmin, color = ~month, type = "box")
```
